subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Pete Carroll said Southern California’s pending appeal will produce transcripts that show the N.C.A.A. had no basis for the sanctions on the U.S.C. football program he once coached.
snippet: Pete Carroll said Southern California’s pending appeal will produce transcripts that show the N.C.A.A. had no basis for the sanctions on the U.S.C. football program he once coached.
